text: Andrewsianthus ferrugineus is a species of liverworts in the family Scapaniaceae. It is found in Bhutan and Nepal. It grows on tree trunks in forests. It is threatened by deforestation.Bryophyte Specialist Group 2000. Andrewsianthus ferrugineus. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2015.2. Downloaded on 31 August 2015. According to the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species, its status is endangered. ==References== Category:Scapaniaceae Category:Endangered plants Category:Flora of Nepal Category:Flora of Bhutan Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Andrewsianthus ferrugineus
